name: d3-rebind
description: Copies a variable number of methods from source to target.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-rebind.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-rebind.js -c -m -o build/d3-rebind.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-rebind.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-rebind.js build/d3-rebind.min.js
